guide.subtitle: The following details will help you better use the product
guide.title: Welcome to Slax Reader

1.content: Collect links, content backed up in your account to ensure good content is not lost
1.title: Backup Content

2.content: Clear and generous layout, comfortable reading experience, easy and natural operation
2.title: Simple and practical

3.content: A great helper for reading long articles, with AI assistance for understanding, supports outputting content summaries and mind maps
3.title: Reading assistant

4.content: AI-assisted questioning and step-by-step inquiry deepen understanding of articles and truly grasp knowledge
4.title: AI Q&A

5.content: Automatically generates usable tags and categories without user intervention, simplifying content organization
5.title: Automatic tagging

6.content: Collect content via browser extensions, iOS and Android apps, Telegram plugins, etc.
6.title: Convenient bookmarking

1.content: Slax Reader is not only a read-later tool, but also a reader's AI assistant, learning community, and knowledge base.
1.title: What is Slax Reader?

2.content: You can email us at hi{'@'}slax.com or find us on Twitter {'@'}SlaxHQ.
2.title: How can I provide feedback on issues?

3.content: We all love reading, continuous learning, and have paid to use various Read it later products over the years, but none have ever fully met our expectations.
3.title: How is our development team?

4.content: AI has shown potential in assisting learning, which may be a variable that could lead to breakthroughs. Therefore, we plan to experiment and iterate this product over the long term (in terms of decades).
4.title: Why create this software?

5.content:
This is currently just an initial preview version, and our differences include:
 · AI Priority: Increased use of AI technology to assist learning
 · Content Backup: Internet link content often gets lost; here, a link once saved is backed up long-term

In the future, we will implement more differentiated capabilities, such as:
 · Multi-agent discussions to deepen understanding
 · Establishing a unique learning community where everyone can discuss and exchange ideas
 · Content Square: Breaking the homogenization problem brought by algorithmic recommendations
 · Content Subscription: Subscribe to people, content, and tags you are interested in
5.title: What makes Slax Reader different from other read-later products?

6.content:
We aim to provide exceptional services at the lowest possible price, hence, you can use features for free including unlimited bookmarks, unlimited content caching (free permanently for early users), unlimited devices, unlimited highlighted comments (coming soon), bookmark imports (coming soon), sharing bookmarks, full-text search, and clients across all platforms.

However, due to the computational demands of AI and the need for sustainable business operations, we also offer a paid professional version. If you need to use features such as AI analysis, AI Q&A, and automatic tagging, a monthly subscription is required.
6.title: Is your product free?

1.1: Support web page collection and search

1.3: Bookmark cache page supports AI Chat

2.2: Bookmark cache page supports highlighting and commenting

3.4: Added positioning of highlights and comments in articles

2.subtitle: Presents long and complex texts in a structured format, with clickable links to jump to corresponding paragraphs
2.title: AI Analysis

3.subtitle: She is a gentle inquirer, a well-read scholar, and a challenger full of personality
3.title: AI Assistant

index.slogan: AI smart learning and social assistant, making knowledge accessible

user.fetch_stripe_info_failed: Failed to fetch Stripe account information
user.import_description: Currently supports importing Omnivore data, more platforms coming soon
user.import_note1: Due to our re-fetching and re-analyzing of imported data, the time required will be proportional to the amount of data.
user.import_note2: Note that we only support basic metadata and re-analyze websites as much as possible. If your data is missing, different, or changed, it is recommended to use our APP/browser extension to re-collect to ensure data completeness.
user.share_my_collection_description: Share your "starred" content to make knowledge accessible
user.stripe_setup_notice: Slax Reader will use your Stripe account for payment, withdrawal, etc., and you need to complete your Stripe account information
